Title: Red Beard
Writer: Masato Ide (screenplay), Hideo Oguni (screenplay), Ryûzô Kikushima (screenplay), Akira Kurosawa (screenplay), Shûgorô Yamamoto (short story collection "Akahige shinryô tan")
Actors: Toshirô Mifune, Yûzô Kayama, Tsutomu Yamazaki, Reiko Dan
Plot: In 19th-century Japan, a rough-tempered yet charitable town doctor trains a young intern.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 10 wins & 1 nomination.
